name: Grilled Swordfish Kabobs with Hawaiian Citrus & Honey-Mustard Sauce
ingredientLines: 16 10-inch wooden skewers - soaked in water for 30 minutes to prevent burning (or you can use metal ones if you have them)
4 swordfish filets (about 8 oz. each) – each cut into 8 pieces
1 large red pepper - ribbed, seeded and cut into 2-inch chunks
1 large sweet onion (purple, Maui or Vidalia) cut into 2-inch chunks
1 pineapple – peeled, cored & cut into 1-inch chunks - reserve juice for sauce
3 limes – cut into ¼ inch slices (ends removed)
1/2 pound small whole mushrooms - baby bellas, button, or shitake - brushed and stemmed
2 teaspoons freshly grated ginger (from 2-inch piece of fresh ginger - peeled)
